Experience.role: Open Source Developer - Google Dev Group
descriptions: Collaborating on backend improvements for Rocket.Chat and FitCheck App, optimizing database queries and streamlining API integrations.
Contributed to the TensorFlow Addons repository, implementing a custom loss function and fixing compatibility issues with TensorFlow
Worked in Horizon Platform Engineering Team, Developed microservices (Spring Boot) for real-time content delivery (Netflix/Spotify integrations) and billing systems.
Modernized legacy monoliths to Spring Cloud architectures for scalable, cloud-native infrastructure.
Engineered Spring Batch workflows to process millions of daily billing events across European markets.
Designed RESTful APIs (Spring Boot 3.x) to streamline integrations with third-party services and internal systems.
Deployed AWS services using Terraform for optimized cloud resource management.
Designed TMF921-compliant reactive APIs (Spring WebFlux) for 5G network orchestration and automation.

On the Network Orchestration Team, developed 5G network slicing solutions using Spring WebFlux/TMF921 APIs to dynamically allocate network resources (bandwidth, latency) based on real-time demand. Automated resource provisioning workflows, reducing manual configuration errors.

Migrated monolithic Java EE applications to Spring Boot microservices, adopting cloud-native design patterns (e.g., circuit breakers, API gateways) for improved scalability. Implemented CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes.

Orchestrated Kubernetes-based Cloud-Native Functions (CNFs) to manage Verizon’s 5G core and IoT device communication. Containerized network services for seamless scaling and rolling updates in distributed environments.
Developed low-latency RESTful APIs (Java 11, Spring Boot) for real-time voice/data routing, leveraging asynchronous processing and connection pooling to handle high-throughput traffic.

Designed Kafka-based event streaming workflows to ingest and process real-time network/IoT telemetry (e.g., device health, traffic patterns). Implemented fault tolerance via replication and dead-letter queues.

Enhanced Oracle/PostgreSQL performance for high-volume transactional systems using JPA/Hibernate optimizations (e.g., batch processing, second-level caching). Streamlined schema design and indexing strategies.

Collaborated with the Infosys Agile DevOps team to architect and deploy comprehensive CI/CD pipelines in an open-source environment—streamlining software deployment processes and significantly reducing release cycles.

Oversaw Oracle and Microsoft SQL Server databases by executing critical management tasks, including the creation and maintenance of databases, users, groups, roles, jobs, and security policies to ensure optimal performance and robust data integrity.

Projects.title: AI Agreement Risk Analyzer
descrip: Tool that simplifies document analysis, extracts key clauses, and assesses risk factors using cutting-edge AI.
